attributes.additional_details:
Ms Theresa May should resign forthwith.
Anarchy broke out across London on Monday night.
After a total failure to act on the complete loss of law and order in Tottenham on the night of Saturday 6th August (which lasted about 11 hours)  the troubles then predictably mushroomed by Monday 8th August 2011 to the worst breakdown in Law and Order this country has seen since the first half of the last century. No Senior Officer has been disciplined. Ms May must take ultimate responsibility for this total failure.
